    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Holocaust and Cinema &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Mar 27, 2015
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/holocaustcinema
     </span>

     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20627441">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20627441">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20627441">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20627441">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20627441" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20627442">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20627442">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20627442">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20627442">
          <div id="boxatt20627442" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24068007">
              <a id="link_24068007" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068007,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068155">
              <a id="link_24068155" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068155,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20627443">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20627443">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20627443">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do locate scholarly articles, books, and chapters?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20627443">
          <div id="boxatt20627443" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24068034">
              <a id="link_24068034" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068034,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24081003">
              <a id="link_24081003" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/advanced?sid=76f9f3e2-2b11-4085-bfb6-5ebb13cafe64%40sessionmgr110&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=127" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24081003,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20020270}); ">
               Communication &amp; Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Scholarly film criticism. 1980s-present. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068012">
              <a id="link_24068012" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068012,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068009">
              <a id="link_24068009" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24081016">
              <a id="link_24081016" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24081016,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068008">
              <a id="link_24068008" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068013">
              <a id="link_24068013" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068013,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24075771">
              <a id="link_24075771" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24075771,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24068010">
              <a id="link_24068010" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24068010,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24075772">
              <a id="link_24075772" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24075772,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343609}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database with journal articles in the arts, humanities, and social sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24081006">
              <a id="link_24081006" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24081006,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust and Cinema', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5504832" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20627444">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20627444">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20627444">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20627444">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20627444" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20627445">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20627445">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20627445">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20627445">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20627445" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
